totd: Your PIN may be locked if you had five short calls in a 30 minute time frame. A short call is any call that is less than 120 seconds long (2 minutes)
If you're locked and your supervisor is not answering, request Voluntary Time Off.

faq.q: What is considered a short call?
faq.a: A short call is any call that is less than 120 seconds long (2 minutes)

faq.q: My PIN is locked and it needs to be unlocked from HQ, but my sup is not answering, what do I do?
faq.a: Try contacting the ERC or the onboarding specialists. In the meantime, request Voluntary Time Off to avoid adherence penalties
